TextBlock.Text: MENTH: I know this one! <Color=lightblue>The Collector</Color>, right? They once released a deadly gas that could have wiped out life in an entire galaxy, but were contained by a tribe of Nomai and other species. Yes, it was a tribe led by a Nomai called Nerine.
CUMIN: Mentor, you know a lot! The Nomai called Nerine is also amazing!
MENTH: That's right... Actually, there was a kid on the Escall's Vessel who knew a lot about this, and he gave me a passionate speech about it. I hope they're safe too.
